description: With the Assemblée Nationale slated to hold a confidence vote that could topple the government next Monday, French President Emmanuel Macron is calling for unity among his ranks. Prime Minister François Bayrou's lack of clear direction has deepened rifts among the various parties within the governing coalition.

headline: Rubio slams France over Palestine recognition
description: The US Secretary of State told reporters in Ecuador on Thursday that he had warned France and other countries that Israel may respond by annexing the West Bank.

headline: Giorgio Armani, one of the makers of modern fashion, is dead
description: Creator, designer and stylist, he made the tailored suit into a status symbol. Armani, who reigned for more than 40 years over a veritable empire, died on Thursday, September 4, at the age of 91, his fashion house confirmed.

headline: Jonathan Anderson brings a breath of fresh art
description: 'Essence of a Style' (2/6). Appointed to the helm of some of the biggest fashion houses, six designers are set to command the industry's attention this season. We look back at what has defined their distinctive touch so far, before their trial by fire. In this chapter, the former creative director of Loewe, who has moved to Dior.

headline: 'Block Everything': Anger in France is deep, but mass strikes appear unlikely
description: The choice of a Wednesday for the planned September 10 protests raises questions about who has the option to strike, especially as labor disputes in French workplaces have been particularly rare in recent years.

headline: Thomas Piketty: 'To succeed in the climate transition, we must redistribute wealth differently'
description: In an interview with Le Monde, the French economist explains that protecting the planet from climate change cannot be achieved without reducing inequality.
